ai-tika-vin02t42:1_0: When they are resort to the definite consequences, they don’t get the same thing as they need. This is the one whose enemy is unity and about the unity of the Dhamma, and so on. Nor do they get caught up in the past, etc., and not to enumeration, and so on.
ai-tika-vin02t42:2_0: In accordance with the Dhamma: among the resting places, etc., are used in the sense of the unsphere .
ai-tika-vin02t42:3_0: For first two months they were told, whether the full-moon day or the dwelling is called a bubble in this monastery.
